verses.verse: "When <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are entering <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, and shall clear <S%H5394><s%> away <S%H5394><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, the Hittites <S%H2850><s%> and the Girgashites <S%H1622><s%> and the Amorites <S%H567><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> and the Hivites <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H7227><s%> and stronger <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> you,

and when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> you, and you shall defeat <S%H5221><s%> them, then you shall utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroy <S%H2763><s%> them. You shall make <S%H3772><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them and show <S%H2603><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> favor <S%H2603><s%> to them.

"Furthermore, you shall not intermarry <S%H2859><s%> with them; you shall not give <S%H5414><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> to their sons, <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall you take <S%H3947><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> for your sons. <S%H1121><s%>

"For they will turn <S%H5493><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> Me to serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods; <S%H430><s%> then the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, and He will quickly <S%H4118><s%> destroy <S%H8045><s%> you.

"But thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to them: you shall tear <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> their altars, <S%H4196><s%> and smash <S%H7665><s%> their [sacred] pillars, <S%H4676><s%> and hew <S%H1438><s%> down <S%H1438><s%> their Asherim, <S%H842><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> their graven <S%H6456><s%> images <S%H6456><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

"For you are a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> you to be a people <S%H5971><s%> for His own possession <S%H5459><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> did not set <S%H2836><s%> His love <S%H2836><s%> on you nor <S%H3808><s%> choose <S%H977><s%> you because <S%H3588><s%> you were more <S%H7231><s%> in number <S%H7231><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> of the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> for you were the fewest <S%H4592><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%>

but because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> you and kept <S%H8104><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He swore <S%H7650><s%> to your forefathers, the Lord <S%H1><s%> brought <S%H3068><s%> you out by a mighty <S%H3318><s%> hand, <S%H2389><s%> and redeemed <S%H3027><s%> you from the house <S%H6299><s%> of slavery, <S%H1004><s%> from the hand <S%H5650><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H3027><s%> king <S%H6547><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4428><s%>

"Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> He is God, <S%H430><s%> the faithful <S%H539><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> who keeps <S%H8104><s%> His covenant <S%H1285><s%> and His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> to a thousandth <S%H505><s%> generation with those who love <S%H157><s%> Him and keep <S%H8104><s%> His commandments; <S%H4687><s%>

but repays <S%H9608><s%> those who hate <S%H8130><s%> Him to their faces, <S%H6440><s%> to destroy them; He will not delay <S%H6><s%> with him who hates <S%H309><s%> Him, He will repay <S%H8130><s%> him to his face. <S%H9608><s%>

"Therefore, you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> and the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them.

"Then it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about, because <S%H6118><s%> you listen <S%H8085><s%> to these <S%H428><s%> judgments <S%H4941><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them, that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> with you His covenant <S%H1285><s%> and His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He swore <S%H7650><s%> to your forefathers.

"And He will love <S%H157><s%> you and bless <S%H1288><s%> you and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you; He will also bless <S%H1288><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your womb and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> your grain <S%H1715><s%> and your new <S%H8492><s%> wine <S%H8492><s%> and your oil, <S%H3323><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your herd <S%H504><s%> and the young <S%H6251><s%> of your flock, <S%H6629><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He swore <S%H7650><s%> to your forefathers to give <S%H1><s%> you.

"You shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> peoples; <S%H5971><s%> there shall be no <S%H3808><s%> male or female barren <S%H6135><s%> among you or among your cattle. <S%H929><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will remove <S%H5493><s%> from you all <S%H3605><s%> sickness; <S%H2483><s%> and He will not put <S%H7760><s%> on you any <S%H3605><s%> of the harmful <S%H7451><s%> diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have known, <S%H3045><s%> but He will lay <S%H5414><s%> them on all <S%H3605><s%> who hate <S%H8130><s%> you.

"And you shall consume <S%H398><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will deliver <S%H5414><s%> to you; your eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%> them, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you serve <S%H5647><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> for that [would be] a snare <S%H4170><s%> to you.

"If <S%H3588><s%> you should say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> 'These <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> are greater <S%H7227><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> I; how <S%H351><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> I dispossess <S%H3423><s%> them?'

you shall not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them; you shall well <S%H2142><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

the great <S%H1419><s%> trials <S%H4531><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> and the signs <S%H226><s%> and the wonders <S%H4159><s%> and the mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and the outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out. So <S%H3651><s%> shall the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> you are afraid. <S%H3372><s%>

"Moreover, <S%H1571><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> against them, until <S%H5704><s%> those who are left <S%H7604><s%> and hide <S%H5641><s%> themselves from you perish.
"You shall not dread <S%H6206><s%> them, for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is in your midst, <S%H7130><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> and awesome <S%H3372><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will clear <S%H5394><s%> away <S%H5394><s%> these <S%H411><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you little <S%H4592><s%> by little; <S%H4592><s%> you will not be able <S%H3201><s%> to put <S%H3615><s%> an end <S%H3615><s%> to them quickly, <S%H4118><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> the wild <S%H7704><s%> beasts <S%H9130><s%> grow <S%H7235><s%> too <S%H5921><s%> numerous <S%H7235><s%> for you.

"But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> you, and will throw <S%H1949><s%> them into great <S%H1419><s%> confusion <S%H4103><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they are destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

"And He will deliver <S%H5414><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%> so that you shall make their name <S%H8034><s%> perish from under <S%H6><s%> heaven; <S%H8478><s%> no <S%H8064><s%> man <S%H3808><s%> will be able to stand <S%H376><s%> before <S%H3320><s%> you until <S%H6440><s%> you have destroyed <S%H5704><s%> them.

"The graven <S%H6456><s%> images <S%H6456><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%> you are to burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire; <S%H784><s%> you shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> or the gold <S%H2091><s%> that is on them, nor <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> it for yourselves, lest <S%H6435><s%> you be snared <S%H3369><s%> by it, for it is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

"And you shall not bring <S%H935><s%> an abomination <S%H8441><s%> into your house, <S%H1004><s%> and like <S%H3644><s%> it come <S%H1961><s%> under <S%H9172><s%> the ban; <S%H9172><s%> you shall utterly <S%H8262><s%> detest <S%H8262><s%> it and you shall utterly <S%H8581><s%> abhor <S%H8581><s%> it, for it is something <S%H9172><s%> banned. <S%H9172><s%>
